description:
HOW TO PARTICIPATE　参加方法！
MOVIE: Mean Girls
映画：ミーン・ガールズ
①Find the movie on Netflix! 　映画を見つけよう！この映画はネットフリックスなら無料！
②Start watching it at the same time as me!　同じタイミングでスタートしよう！
③Listen to my commentary and enjoy it together with me!　うちの声聞きながら見よう！


- I can obviously not show the movie on screen, so have me on another screen! 
映画はさすがにうちの画面で見せられないから皆２窓してもろて！


 🏵️[Hashtags] 🏵️
#kfp #キアライブ#hololiveenglish #holomyth #takanashikiara 
FANART #artsofashes #絵ニックス


 🏵️[Twitter] 🏵️
https://twitter.com/takanashikiara

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

[Viewer Rules]
Thank you for watching my stream!
To help everyone enjoy the stream more, please follow these rules:
1.Be nice to other viewers. Don’t spam or troll 
2.If you see spam or trolling, don’t respond. Just block, report, and ignore those comments.
3.Talk about the stream, but please don’t bring up unrelated topics or have personal conversations.
4.Don’t bring up other streamers or streams unless I mention them.
5.Similarly, don’t talk about me or my stream in other streamers’ chat.
6.Chatting before the stream starts is fine as long as it's not completely unrelated to Takanashi Kiara.
7. Backseating is welcome in most of my streams unless I say so. No spoilers!

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

loading screen BGM used
Ending BGM arrangement by @MasterJonald (twitter)

title: 【LET'S WATCH】"Mean Girls" ! GIRLSGIRLSGIRLS【映画同時視聴】
